NIT<-targets[which(targets$Group=="NIT" & targets$molecular_data_type=="RNA Seq (NGS)"),]
ELI<-targets[which(targets$Group=="ELI" & targets$molecular_data_type=="RNA Seq (NGS)"),]
SFI<-targets[which(targets$Group=="SFI" & targets$molecular_data_type=="RNA Seq (NGS)"),]
# Escogo 10 muestras al azar de los grupos NIT y SFI y uso todos los datos de ELI
NIT<-NIT[NIT$ShortName %in% sample(unique(NIT$ShortName),10),]
head(NIT)
